name: LivaAsia TV
overview:
Live Asia TV is the developer and operator of a proprietary Over the Top Video solution for streaming Live/Linear and On-Demand video content. The company developed and now operates a unique advanced technology broadcasting software-based system, chosen by leading content owners and telecommunication operators around the globe. The company addresses the urgent needs of any telecommunication operator that is looking to add TV-Everywhere products to its exitsting offering along with unique content products, all off the shelf and ready for immediate integration and launch. Through its subsidiaries, the company already generates end user subscription revenues through two innovative video platforms: WatchIndia and WatchPhilippines, and is in the process of adding two new platforms aggregating prime Korean and Chinese content.

The company’s buisness model offers a unique opportunity for new, disruptive platforms to emerge out of the changing media landscape with and attractive financial model for opertators and content owners to grow revenues.
